definition: to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

pinyin: ruan3 jian4 kai1 fa1 ren2 yuan2

sentences.english: As a developer, this is what you should strive for.
sentences.chinese: 这就是作为一个开发人员所需要追求的。

sentences.english: The burden is on the developer for resolving these conflicts.
sentences.chinese: 解决这些冲突的负担落在了开发人员身上。

sentences.english: Developers use software tools to do their jobs.
sentences.chinese: 开发人员使用软件工具完成工作。

sentences.english: A lot of software developers have a similar split.
sentences.chinese: 很多软件开发人员也有类似的分工。

sentences.english: The system developers are paying particular attention to functionality and user friendliness.
sentences.chinese: 开发人员特别强调了系统的功能性和可操作性。

sentences.english: The customer and developer negotiate a fixed price for the project.
sentences.chinese: 客户和开发人员协商项目的固定价格。

sentences.english: It gives developers direction as to where the changes should occur.
sentences.chinese: 它向开发人员指明变更将在哪里发生的方向。

sentences.english: The developers need only understand when and to what to apply the aspects.
sentences.chinese: 开发人员只需要了解什么时候，对什么应用这些方面。

sentences.english: What do the developers think are the highest-risk aspects of the application?
sentences.chinese: 开发人员认为应用程序中风险最高的方面是哪些方面？

sentences.english: He puts out code faster than any developer on the team.
sentences.chinese: 他代码写起来比团队的任何开发人员都快。

sentences.english: But first he had to figure out whether developers would play along.
sentences.chinese: 但是首先他得确定开发人员是否愿意和他一起干。

sentences.english: However, none of this lets developers ignore buffer overflows.
sentences.chinese: 然而，没有哪种方法允许开发人员忽略缓冲区溢出。

sentences.english: Developers can use the blueprint to edit the code for inclusion in components.
sentences.chinese: 开发人员可使用此蓝图来编辑组件中的包含代码。

sentences.english: Setup pre-flight testing builds for developers.
sentences.chinese: 为开发人员设置事先准备好的测试构建。

sentences.english: In the first step, create a copy of your main schema for every developer.
sentences.chinese: 在第一步中，为每一个开发人员创建主要方案的拷贝。

sentences.english: Testing boundary conditions forces you to question your assumptions.
sentences.chinese: 测试边界条件会迫使开发人员明确考虑自己的假设。

pinyin: ruan3 jian4 kai1 fa1 ren2 yuan2

definition: see 開放源碼|开放源码[kai1 fang4 yuan2 ma3]
